attributes.action: Charge foreign vehicles to use our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the british motorist have to pay for a road exise licence...Why then can foreign vehicles weather it be a car,van or lorry get straight off the ship and drive on our roads without being charged....Charge them to create revenue rather than tax our own people and buisnesses to death

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
